subject: Hunting and Trapping
lead_paragraph: The British Parliament’s controversial Hunting Act in 2005 made the use of dogs to kill prey illegal. To keep fox hunting alive, clubs have resorted to drag hunting, in which a scent is laid artificially.
snippet: The British Parliament’s controversial Hunting Act in 2005 made the use of dogs to kill prey illegal. To keep fox hunting alive, clubs have resorted to drag hunting, in which a scent is laid artificially.
